Articles.Content:
Hello, this is my self-made little Kerbal with a Blue Planet in the background. I used Photoshop for it, took me over four hours. (I'm a beginner.)

That's my first drawn Picture on a Computer.

Do you like it? Or is something not right? Just tell me, I'm a beginner, so I need some criticism.
Pretty good! I think you'll find projects like these add much to your Photoshop abilities.
I like it. Reminds me of "South Park" animation style for some reason.

I like it. Reminds me of "South Park" animation style for some reason.

Yeah it does... Anyways for a first pc drawing thats pretty good! My criticisms (i know its your first but its always to have things to work on, like i need to get wayy better at drawing people..) woulde be that the legs need shifting over a bit, the part where his legs join his body doesnt seem to.. Work well... As well as his waist. He seems to get slightly chubby but other than that its fine! I love the art style.
